Package com.google.tts

Interface Summary
TTS.InitListener Called when the TTS has initialized The InitListener must implement the onInit function.
 

Class Summary
TTS Synthesizes speech from text.
TTSVersionAlert Creates an alert message that gives the user the option to install the missing TTS that is needed through the Android Market.
 

Enum Summary
TTSEngine Enumerates the possible TTS engines to pass to the TTS.
TTSParams Enumerates the possible parameters to pass to the TTS.
